    			      MOVIE Plot

	After traveling the world in his quest to kill Blofeld,
	Bond returns triumphant, only to discover a case waiting for him:
	a large amount of diamonds has been stolen from the
	South African mines and two offbeat assassins are
	killing everyone in the smuggling ring one-by-one.
	Bond goes undercover as Peter Franks, diamond smuggler.
	What he discovers shocks him: the head of the smuggling ring
	is none other than Ernst Stavros Blofeld!
	Now, Bond must resist the wiles of a beautiful smuggler
	and survive the machinations of Mr. Wint and Mr. Kidd,
	Blofeld's two best assassins so that he can uncover
	Blofeld's sinister plot.


Enjoy
